Question: Zhongshan Vastfafa Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhongshan Vastfafa Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd.

Product Highlights

- Surge protection devices
- Master/slave power strips
- WiFi control sockets
- Power strips with USB charging
- Power extension cables
- Power travel adaptors
- PDUs (Power Distribution Units)
- Baby electric music shakers
- Baby cribs and swings
- Pivot flexible power strips
- Wireless chargers and charging stations
